thread.title: Full text of the Supreme Court judgment on Disproportionate Assets Case
thread.title_full: Full text of the Supreme Court judgment on Disproportionate Assets Case

title: Full text of the Supreme Court judgment on Disproportionate Assets Case
text:
Full text of the Supreme Court judgment on Disproportionate Assets Case February 14, 2017 16:08 IST Updated: February 14, 2017 16:09 IST Share Article February 14, 2017 16:08 IST Updated: February 14, 2017 16:09 IST more-in The Supreme Court ordered Sasikala, Ilavarasi and Sudhakaran to surrender forthwith before the trial court concerned. 
The Supreme Court on Tuesday set aside AIADMK general secretary V.K. Sasikala's acquittal by the Karnataka High Court in the Jayalalithaa disproportionate assets case and "restored in full" the trial court conviction of September 2014.
